column1: Table 6 11: Tentative cost for the improvement of Maussawa Wewa

1. Dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave/ Kumbuk/ Mee/ Madan/ Nelli/ Durian/ Mandarin/ Orange/ Avocado/ Guava/ Mango/ Aththikka/ Wal del/ Kekuna randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid intervals for 1000 m2.
2. Apply mulching, organic manure, and NPK fertilizer.
3. Introduction of Bamboo, Vetiver grass, and riparian plants. The covered area is 100 m2, and there is a row of Areca nut trees.
4. Maintain for six months and continue watering for one year as required.
Supplying and fixing 300mm diameter cast iron gate, sliding frame, spindle, brass nut and housing, etc.
